thread.title: Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard

title: Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard
text:
> Top News Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard Brett Stegmaier waits to tee off on the sixth hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken)
